meanings.definition: The attitude or policy of maintaining the status quo and resisting change.

meanings.sent3: Despite his standpatism, he couldn't resist trying the new ice cream flavor.
meanings.sent4: The standpatism of the old oak tree symbolized resilience in the face of storms.

meanings.sent2: The politician's standpatism made him hesitant to embrace new technologies.
meanings.sent3: His standpatism about fashion led to some interesting retro outfits.
